snippet: Barry Obama smoked a lot of pot as a teenager. This doesn’t make him a reprobate; it makes him a product of his place and times. He came into his hobby as Hawaii’s marijuana culture hit its high point.
abstract: Lawrence Downes Editorial Observer defends fact that Barack Obama smoked marijuana as a teenager, saying it was an integral part of Hawaiian culture at the time.
lead_paragraph: Barry Obama smoked a lot of pot as a teenager. This doesn’t make him a reprobate; it makes him a product of his place and times. He came into his hobby as Hawaii’s marijuana culture hit its high point.
